meanings.definition: A person who edits a publication with another person.
meanings.sent1: The coeditors worked together to improve the article.
meanings.sent2: The magazine has two coeditors who review all the content.
meanings.sent3: The coeditors found a typo and laughed about it.
meanings.sent4: The collaboration between the coeditors was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The coeditors' dedication to perfection made the publication stand out.

meanings.definition: More than one person who edits a publication together.
meanings.sent1: Our team of coeditors ensures the magazine is error-free.
meanings.sent2: The coeditors meet regularly to discuss upcoming issues.
meanings.sent3: The coeditors accidentally swapped their editing notes.
meanings.sent4: The synergy between the coeditors elevated the publication's quality.
meanings.sent5: The coeditors' attention to detail is unmatched in the industry.
